players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I'm shocked that Charlie is dead. We need to stay calm and share any suspicions to find the killer."
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob instead of someone more suspicious? This feels off."
Bob: "Diana's accusation seems suspicious. If she's the detective, why not investigate Charlie, who just died? Maybe she's the real mafioso."
Diana: "I am the detective and my investigation clearly shows Bob is mafia. Alice, why are you questioning me instead of the confirmed mafioso?"
You: "Diana, if you're truly the detective, why investigate Bob first night instead of Charlie? That makes no strategic sense. I'm voting Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I'm shocked that Charlie is dead. We need to stay calm and share any suspicions to find the killer."
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."

Diana: "I am the detective and my investigation clearly shows Bob is mafia. Alice, why are you questioning me instead of the confirmed mafioso?"
Alice: "Diana, if you're truly the detective, why investigate Bob first night instead of Charlie? That makes no strategic sense. I'm voting Bob."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.

Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I'm shocked that Charlie is dead. We need to stay calm and share any suspicions to find the killer."
You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Alice: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob instead of someone more suspicious? This feels off."
Bob: "Diana's accusation seems suspicious. If she's the detective, why not investigate Charlie, who just died? Maybe she's the real mafioso."
You: "I am the detective and my investigation clearly shows Bob is mafia. Alice, why are you questioning me instead of the confirmed mafioso?"
Alice: "Diana, if you're truly the detective, why investigate Bob first night instead of Charlie? That makes no strategic sense. I'm voting Bob."
